x = df['Mat']
plt.figure(figsize=(10,8))
ax = sns.countplot(x,color='#00ffff')
ax.set_xlabel(xlabel = 'Age of the Players', fontsize = 16)
ax.set_title(label = 'Distribution of Age of the Players', fontsize = 20)
plt.show()
